p: Greenish blue solid (yield: 59%) m.p.: 207–209 °C, mass (EI): calculated for C20H14BrClN4: 424 gm/mol [M+], found fragmented peak at 412, 1H NMR (CDCl3, 400 MHz, δ with TMS = 0): 8.17 (s, 1H), 7.99 (s, 1H), 7.87 (d, J = 8Hz, 1H), 7.81 (d, J = 8 Hz, 1H), 7.74 (m, 1H), 7.63 (m, 1H), 7.58 (d, J = 8 Hz, 2H), 7.55 (d, J = 12 Hz, 2H), 4.60 (s, 1H), 3.64–3.55 (m, 3H).
